text: I sold a beautiful very expensive bag. I described the bag perfectly. They then contacted both me and the buyer to tell her that , although I had described it correctly,  they were going against their own terms and conditions and offering her a full refund,  encouraging her not to buy ! Absolutely crazy.  They do not make any sense. Contacted customer non service,  who hung up on me . Got another one who said " oh no , this is actually very serious,  I'll get someone to contact you.  We will escalate this . They should NEVER have done this ". Alas , no contact from them ever again. The only positive reviews seem to have been " Invited ". Maybe they're offering them money or something?

author: Nga
text:
I wonder why there are some good review about the VC, they are fake reviews as you can see most of them are put the same tittle “Very satisfied with the site”.
I paid an item and DHL shipping fees. The item marked sent by Chronopost, VC uploaded the invalid tracking numbers.  At the same time, DHL sent me the notification on this item will ship by DHL, contacted DHL and they confirmed that the shipper (VC) did not pass the item to them and they just generated the shipping label, DHL said they did same things to others as well, that meant I am not the only person to suffer on this confusion about VC shipping.  Chatted with VC everyday and emailed them for this issue.
1. Why the shipping is handled by Chronopost 
2. Why the tracking numbers are invalid
3. The customer service chat representative promised will looking after this case and will transfer to expert team, but never happened, never get any response from them.
I found the customer service representatives are all lying, i waited for more than one hour to queue, when they pick up my case, they just want the chat to be finish and not doing any follow up, not answering my questions and not care at all.
I used VC before and it was not like this in the past 5 years, I am living at the apartment and everyday I spent at least one hour to use chat and emails with VC, need to tell them the whole story again and again. To making purchase at VC can bring us this pressure.
title: Buyers Be aware! Provided invalid tracking numbers, make receiver harder and cannot claim lost item

author: Petra Kiuru
text:
I ordered a pair of Fendi Ski pants which were not as good condition as described. There were stains and pulls on the garment. VC agreed to make a second quality check and now after 1 month I don’t hear anything! Ski season is over and I don’t need these anymore, but they are not returning the money. 
This is the third time in a row I have bad experience (two previous ones were a broken Chanel bag that passed their qc and one fake Moncler). 
Based on this, I’d strongly advise to stay away because you really don’t know if you’ll get bad quality or not authentic goods. 
Not for me anymore.

Edit 15th March:
Still not receiving any update despite many emails. This company is just totally ignoring customers!
title: Vestiaire Collective is just one bad experience after another

author: Catherine
text:
This is the third time I have sold on this site and the second with a dreadful and horrendous experience and I definitely not be using them again and advise all others to avoid. 

I received notification from Vestiaire Collective one of my items had been sold but the shipping label they sent me was to ship to Hong Kong even though I lived in Spain I knew this could not been correct but I went online and chatted with their representative name of Yann who told me this was correct and to print the label off and take it to the post office and it would be shipped for free. I did this and I was right I had been sent an incorrect address label and a new one was issued to France and was collected by UPS. The item was received and even though it was brand new with labels and I took photos before sending as I have had a problem before with this company stating brand new items with labels are defective on receipt they claimed there was a fault. I was given the chance to accept the drop in price and as I wanted rid of any dealings with this company any further I accepted via their app and in a further email I received. Their app and link in their email is clearly not working as I have just been told they are waiting to hear from me and not to keep the buyer waiting. I had fortunately screen captured everything and forwarded it to them but what I have found when a representative from Vestiaire Collective cannot answer a query they choose to leave the chat and the customer waiting. I have also resorted to emailing the CEO Maximilian Bittner but him nor a representative has the courtesy or good manners in replying.
title: Avoid!

author: Alina
text:
I have been a seller for almost a year and all this time there have been no problems with paying for my sold items. But the latest sale 13856707 made me write this review here. I have successfully sold the item last week, VC informed me that payment for it will be transferred to my paypal account on 26/02. Today is 02/03 and I still haven't received my money... I contact the support team for the fourth day and I only hear ridiculous excuses, like that it is a bank delay (but I have Paypal account), then they say that the money has been sent and I have to wait. On another day, they say that they have not sent it yet, to my question “why?”, the assistant could not answer and said to wait again. I'm afraid I lost my money. The support service just doesn't know anything and doesn't do anything. On Sunday, the assistant left the chat unceremoniously. Today I have been waiting in line for the chat for 4.5 hours and there are 63 people in the queue. I tried to contact via email, but I got the same stupid answer “wait”. I do not understand what exactly I should wait if they themselves indicated the date of the transfer 26/02. The rules say that the payment will be processed within 24h or the following working day. So 26/02 or 01/03. Ant after that it should appear in my paypal account in 24h. I DID NOT RECEIVE MY MONEY. Dear Vestiare, are you kidding your sellers or now you are the scam company? I definitely will give a course of this story and tell about it also in other sources. I have all the correspondence with your unqualified support service and also print screenshots from my office.
Update: payment received with delay, 04/03.
title: I have sold the item but did not get payment
